alert_messages: ALERT: CPU usage has exceeded threshold at 87.5%. System performance may be degraded.
ALERT: Memory usage is critically high at 92.3%. Potential system instability detected.
ALERT: Disk space is running low at 15.2% remaining. Storage capacity requires immediate attention.
recommendations: Monitor running processes and consider scaling resources or optimizing CPU-intensive tasks
Immediately restart memory-intensive applications or increase available RAM allocation
Clean up unnecessary files, archive old data, or provision additional storage capacity
